actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that no Federal funds are authorized for, or may be apportioned, expended, or obligated for, construction of the North South Distributor Freeway in St. Louis, Missouri.

summary.text: Prohibits any Federal funds from being authorized or spent for construction of the North South Distributor Freeway in St. Louis, Missouri.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no Federal funds are authorized for, or may be apportioned, expended, or obligated for, construction of the North South Distributor Freeway in St. Louis, Missouri.
